node.name: i-net Doqua
node.shortdescription: i-net Doqua supports documentation writer and developer likewise to keep track of inconsistency between your - or your companies - style guides and the actual documentation. The system integrates seamles as plugin into the Eclipse IDE and introduces a new perspektive and several views. Since i-net Doqua uses standard JUnit testcases to check the documentation - you can trigger checks using Hudson or similar Ant based systems.
node.body: i-net Doqua supports documentation writer and developer likewise to keep track of inconsistency between your - or your companies - style guides and the actual documentation. The system integrates seamles as plugin into the Eclipse IDE and introduces a new perspektive and several views. Since i-net Doqua uses standard JUnit testcases to check the documentation - you can trigger checks using Hudson or similar Ant based systems.
